text: BeBe & CeCe Winans is the second studio album by American gospel singing duo BeBe & CeCe Winans, released in 1987 on Capitol Records.BeBe & CeCe Winans - Album Discography.Allmusic The album reached number 12 on the Billboard Top Gospel Albums chart, and features the hit singles "Change Your Nature", "I.O.U. Me" and "Love Said Not So". CeCe Winans won a Grammy Award for Best Soul Gospel Performance, Female for the song "For Always." == Track listing == ==Personnel== * Arranged by [backing vocals] – BeBe Winans, CeCe Winans, Keith Thomas, Marvin Winans * BeBe Winans – lead vocals, backing vocals * CeCe Winans – lead vocals, backing vocals * Backing vocals [additional] – Angie Winans, Bebe & Cece Winans, Constance Jackson, Debra K. Winans, Debra R. Winans, Kevin Jackson, Michael Winans, Regina Winans, Ronald Winans, Vicki Winans * Arranged by [strings] – Keith Thomas * Percy Bady – synthesizer, arrangements * Mark Hammond – drums, drum programming * Keith Thomas – keyboards * Jimmie Lee Sloas – bass * Tom Hemby – guitar * Mark Douthit – saxophone ==Production== * Producer – Keith Thomas * Executive producers – Michael Brown and Wayne Edwards * Production assistance – Brett Perry * Recorded and mixed by Jeff Balding * Engineer [assistant] – Bill Heath, Billy Whitington, Michael Koreba * Recorded at OmniSound Studios, Gold Mine Studio East (Brentwood, TN); Hummingbird Studios (Nashville, TN); Bullet Recording Studios (Nashville, TN) * Mixed at OmniSound Studios and Digital Recorders * Mastered by Steve Hall at Future Disc (Hollywood, CA) == Charts == {| class="wikitable" !align="center"|Chart (1987) !align="center"|Peak positionBeBe & CeCe Winans - Albums and Singles Chart History.Billboard |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard 200 |align="center"| – |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums |align="center"|49 |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Top Gospel Albums |align="center"|12 |} Singles {|class="wikitable" |- !Year !Title !width="40"| |- |rowspan=2|1987 |"I.O.U. Me" |style="text- align:center;"|2 |- |"Love Said Not So" |style="text-align:center;"|11 |- |1988 |"Change Your Nature" |style="text-align:center;"|8 |} ==References== Category:1987 albums Category:BeBe & CeCe Winans albums
